item.description:
details on our meeting location to ride to the registration to follow on www.newenglandthunder.com calendar

Cycles for Sinai
A LEAD RUN for the benefit of New England Sinai Hospital.
Sunday, October 25, 2009
Staging: 9:30 - 11:30 AM at Town Spa Pizza
1119 Washington Street
Route 138,
Stoughton, MA
Finish: 1:00 - 4:00 pm, New England Sinai Hospital
150 York Street
Stoughton, MA

Complimentary food, music, fun

$20 donation per person

A 50 mile ride through the highways and byways of southeastern Massachusetts
Presented by the Sinai Hospital Men's Associates

Costumes optional (with prize going to best costume)

For information, call Margi at 781-297-1333 or email her at msandman@nesinai.org =

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Cycles For Sinai Halloween ride
